select t.id id, -- t.spec_code specCode, -- 规格代码 ufs.spec_name specName, -- 规格名称 uft.type_name typeName, -- 类型 t.feeder_sn feederSn, -- 料枪SN t.right_channel_sn rightChannelSn, -- 右通道SN t.left_channel_sn leftChannelSn, -- 左通道SN t.in_channel_sn inChannelSn, -- 中通道SN t.mainten_cycle_code maintenCycleCode, -- 保养类型 smci.cycle_name maintenCycleName, -- 保养类型名 t.mainten_cycle_days maintenCycleDays, -- 提醒周期 t.line_code lineCode, -- 线别代码 ulb.line_name lineName, -- 线别 t.sc_flag scFlag, -- 正反面 t.position position, -- 站位 t.state state, -- 状态 t.create_time createTime, -- 创建时间:按当前时间自动创建 t.update_time updateTime -- 更新时间 from sps_feeder_info t left join ums_feeder_spec ufs on t.spec_code = ufs.spec_code left join ums_feeder_type uft on ufs.type_id = uft.id left join sps_mainten_cycle_info smci on t.mainten_cycle_code = smci.cycle_code left join ums_line_body ulb on t.line_code = ulb.line_code where 1=1
and t.spec_code LIKE '%${p.specCode}%'
and uft.type_name LIKE '%${p.typeName}%'
and t.feeder_sn LIKE '%${p.feederSn}%'
and t.right_channel_sn LIKE '%${p.rightChannelSn}%'
and t.left_channel_sn LIKE '%${p.leftChannelSn}%'
and t.in_channel_sn LIKE '%${p.inChannelSn}%'
and t.mainten_cycle_code LIKE '%${p.maintenCycleCode}%'
and t.mainten_cycle_days LIKE '%${p.maintenCycleDays}%'
and t.line_code LIKE '%${p.lineCode}%'
and t.sc_flag LIKE '%${p.scFlag}%'
and t.state LIKE '%${p.state}%'
and t.position LIKE '%${p.position}%'
and t.create_time >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.create_time
order by t.id desc
